tier.item: (57) Kocho-wa usuhige-no aru iro-no kuroi me-no
principal-TOP mustache-GEN be color-GEN black eye-GEN
`The principal was a dark complexioned man, with a whispery
mustache and large eyes like a badger. He was pompous.'
